description: Use the chrome.topSites API to access the top sites that are displayed on the new tab page.

functions.name: get
functions.description: Gets a list of top sites.

providers.deprecated: Please use the other options to tune the results received from topSites.

limit.description: The number of top sites to return, defaults to the value used by Firefox

onePerDomain.description: Limit the result to a single top site link per domain

includeBlocked.description: Include sites that the user has blocked from appearing on the Firefox new tab.

includePinned.description: Include sites that the user has pinned on the Firefox new tab.

includeSearchShortcuts.description: Include search shortcuts appearing on the Firefox new tab.

newtab.description: Return the sites that exactly appear on the user's new-tab page. When true, all other options are ignored except limit and includeFavicon. If the user disabled newtab Top Sites, the newtab parameter will be ignored.

MostVisitedURL.description: An object encapsulating a most visited URL, such as the URLs on the new tab page.

favicon.description: Data URL for the favicon, if available.

type.description: The entry type, either url for a normal page link, or search for a search shortcut.
